CustomField.description: If non-blank, then use of this template is restricted to letters whose linked proposals have one of the given statuses. The value (if any) should be a comma-separated list of numeric statuses.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If non-blank, then use of this template is restricted to letters whose linked proposals have one of the given statuses. The value (if any) should be a comma-separated list of numeric statuses.
CustomField.label: Allowed statuses
